settingsPage.title: Settings
settingsPage.description: Manage application preferences and view system information

agentList.builtinPresetEditHint: Built-in presets cannot be edited. Please switch to 'Current Config' or create a custom preset.

agentDescriptions.sisyphus: Main executor, responsible for executing tasks in the work plan, continuously pushing until completion
agentDescriptions.sisyphus-junior: Lightweight executor, handles delegated subtasks, suitable for small to medium work
agentDescriptions.hephaestus: Code craftsman, focused on code implementation, building and engineering details
agentDescriptions.oracle: Technical advisor, provides architecture recommendations and deep technical analysis
agentDescriptions.librarian: Knowledge retriever, searches documentation, API references and best practices
agentDescriptions.explore: Code explorer, analyzes code repository structure, finds references and patterns
agentDescriptions.multimodal-looker: Multimodal observer, analyzes images, PDFs and other visual content
agentDescriptions.prometheus: Strategy planner, responsible for requirements analysis and work plan formulation
agentDescriptions.metis: Plan reviewer, checks plan completeness and potential omissions
agentDescriptions.momus: Quality auditor, strictly verifies every detail of the plan
agentDescriptions.atlas: Task scheduler, coordinates multi-task parallel execution and dependency management
agentDescriptions.build: Build agent, handles compilation, packaging and deployment related tasks
agentDescriptions.plan: Plan agent, assists with task planning and decomposition
agentDescriptions.OpenCode-Builder: OpenCode builder, core code generation and modification agent
agentDescriptions.general: General agent, handles unclassified general tasks
agentDescriptions.frontend-ui-ux-engineer: Frontend engineer, focused on UI/UX design and frontend implementation
agentDescriptions.document-writer: Document writer, responsible for technical documentation and instruction writing

categoryDescriptions.visual-engineering: Visual engineering tasks: frontend, UI/UX, design, styling, animation
categoryDescriptions.ultrabrain: High-difficulty logic tasks: complex algorithms, architecture design, deep reasoning
categoryDescriptions.deep: Deep research tasks: complex problems requiring thorough understanding before action
categoryDescriptions.artistry: Creative tasks: unconventional solutions, innovative design, breakthrough ideas
categoryDescriptions.quick: Quick tasks: single file modifications, spelling fixes, simple adjustments
categoryDescriptions.writing: Writing tasks: documentation, technical writing, instruction documents
categoryDescriptions.visual: Visual tasks: charts, visualization, interface related
categoryDescriptions.business-logic: Business logic tasks: core functionality, data processing, API
categoryDescriptions.data-analysis: Data analysis tasks: statistics, reports, data processing

update.description: Check and install the latest version of OMO Switch
update.autoNote: Updates are checked automatically on startup. You'll be notified when a new version is available.

versionBadge.available: New version v{{version}} available, click to view/install

updater.downloadHint: You can close this window and continue working. The download will continue in the background.
updater.downloadedHint: Update package downloaded. Click 'Install and Restart' to complete the update.
updater.installingHint: Installing, please do not close the application
updater.errorFallback: Update failed, please try again later
updater.errorExtra: If you just integrated Updater, please add plugins.updater.pubkey in tauri.conf.json and configure TAURI_SIGNING_PRIVATE_KEY in CI.

toast.checkFailedPubkey: Failed to check: missing public key
toast.installManual: Update installed, please restart the app manually
